title: Halp. (Client Issues)
body: My client isn't booting up at all all of a sudden? All I get is an error message telling me that either the program isn't designed for Windows or there's an error in it.  Real helpful, I know. I un/reinstalled like it said, but nothing changed.  I still get the same message.  Has this been happening to anyone else?

replies.body:
Sounds like some of the game files might not be installing correctly or getting corrupted in the process. Run through the steps in the image below, and let me know if that helps at all.

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qqkPaaER,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-20T20:55:55.926+0000)
>
> Sounds like some of the game files might not be installing correctly or getting corrupted in the process. Run through the steps in the image below, and let me know if that helps at all.
> 
> https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

Thanks!  Worked like a charm.  Any idea what I did to cause this in the first place?
It was most likely just a random issue where a file messed up and bugged out. Most likely wasn't anything you did perse.
Yes, it happened to me too. I also removed and try to reinstall (like it said) but when I click "launch" in the client, again that message. <sigh>
